column5: Hello, Just wondering if it is true that you no longer need to register with ArriveCan to enter Canada? Called the phone number and heard recording but did not know that it was no longer needed. Thanks, John
I think you can still use it but not sure if it will save any time at the border.
Thank you I was panicking knowing that last year you had to do it within 72 hours of arrival so thats one more not to worry about
It wasn't needed last August when I was up there.
